Name: Dress Up High School Girl - new celebrity style fashion makeover
Description:
*** Ultimate dress up game for fashionistas! A free app for all! ***

Dress Up High School Girl is a makeup game for girls and teens that will help you release your inner fashion ideas! Create your own wardrobe from our closet of vintage clothing and accessories. Name it, we have it! Enjoy the most exciting game for all fashion queens.
Dress your model, bring her to spa and transform into a complete trendsetter! What are you waiting for? Play Dress Up High School Girl now!

FEATURES:
- Mix and match different clothing items to create a perfect outfit
- Shoes, shirts, and skirts in various models and colors
- Improve final look by adding accessories such as sunglasses, necklaces, purses and more!
- Share your fashion ideas in the most popular social networks
- Take a picture of your model and share it to your family and friends
- Safe and cool to play for kids of all ages!

Download and play Dress Up High School Girl and stay classy at school!

Name: Get Out Tha House
Description:
There are so many subjects that should be covered in high school that simply aren’t even addressed that every student should be exposed to so they know what to do step-by-step before they move out of their parents house.

This Guide is to help Young Adults, even Adults understand what they need to know to Get Out Tha House & not have to move back in with their parents because Life Happened to them…an example of ’Life Happened’ is when a young person opens a bank account and doesn’t keep up with it, ends up with overdraft fees, & eventually is reported to ChexSystems & maybe even their Credit Report...all because it wasn’t taught they should start with a bank account with no monthly fees & no overdraft on their account. Bad Credit is a downward spiral of a miserable financial life & forces you to make one bad credit decision after another.

Use this Guide to learn the Adult Stuff no one else teaches you in one place. It’s a simple read & subjects are added regularly; I do take requests.
